articles.title: Longline Acoustic Monitoring Project
articles.contents:
Longline Acoustic Monitoring Project Hub

              Longline Acoustic Monitoring Project
            
            
              
                
            
          
        
        
        
          
            
            About this site
            This repo is Longline Acoustic Monitoring Project Hub - a
            central location for documentation and guides to data
            organization.
            The web address for this repository is: sfregosi.github.io/llamp-hub
            This repository and site are public, but a more
            extensive private llamp
            repository contains additional code and analyses.
            
            Site Contents
            Summary -
            High level summary of work conducted so far
            Protocols - Top left menu to detailed
            protocols for specific components/steps of the project:
            vessel recruitment, hardware, data processing, analysis, and
            reporting.
            Drive
            docs - links and descriptions of important docs
            and sheets on Google Drive. Access to individual links is
            restricted based on Google Drive sharing settings.
            
            
            
            
            About this project
            The Longline Acoustic Monitoring Project (recently dubbed
            LLAMP) is a collaborative project between NOAA NMFS PIFSC
            and the Hawaiian longline fleet to better understand how and
            why false killer whales interact with the fishery, and try
            to reduce these interactions.
            This project has been going on for many years and
            involves many wonderful people!
            
            DISCLAIMER:
            The scientific results and conclusions, as well as
            any views or opinions expressed herein, are those of the
            author(s) and do not necessarily reflect the views of NOAA
            or the Department of Commerce.
             This repository is a scientific product and is not
            official communication of the National Oceanic and
            Atmospheric Administration, or the United States Department
            of Commerce. All NOAA GitHub project code is provided on an
            ‘as is’ basis and the user assumes responsibility for its
            use. Any claims against the Department of Commerce or
            Department of Commerce bureaus stemming from the use of this
            GitHub project will be governed by all applicable Federal
            law. Any reference to specific commercial products,
            processes, or services by service mark, trademark,
            manufacturer, or otherwise, does not constitute or imply
            their endorsement, recommendation or favoring by the
            Department of Commerce. The Department of Commerce seal and
            logo, or the seal and logo of a DOC bureau, shall not be
            used in any manner to imply endorsement of any commercial
            product or activity by DOC or the United States Government.
            
            Last Update: 07 Feb 2023
